CustomField.formula: IF( OR(animalos__Observed_Physical_Violence__c, animalos__Observed_Verbal_Abuse__c, animalos__Observed_Firearms_Weapons__c, animalos__Observed_Substance_Abuse__c, animalos__Observed_Known_to_Police__c), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/red.png","RED", 16, 32), IF( OR(animalos__Reported_Physical_Violence__c, animalos__Reported_Verbal_Abuse__c, animalos__Reported_Firearms_Weapons__c, animalos__Reported_Substance_Abuse__c, animalos__Reported_Known_to_Police__c), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/yellow.png","YELLOW", 16, 32), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/default.png","DEFAULT", 16, 32) ) )
CustomField.label: Advisory
